song.title: But it doesn't happen
song.info:
Revision Streaming Music Entry #13
We are sitting here and try to party but we get depressed by the music
The room is dark and so are our souls The bass is dark and so is the room
But we hope it will change change in a few minutes to something better to something more h0ffman ohu ohu h0ffman
But it doesn't happen
We gonna be depressed for the rest of this song we gonna be depressed for the rest of this song for the rest of this song
But it doesn't happen
This is the sound of a C64 (SID) Smashed on the floor (Crash) by a young carnivore (Rooar) and then cut by a chainsaw (Kettens√§ge)
I am sure you adore this kind of metaphor and you shall not ignore that it's just a commodore ho ho ho happy easter everywhore
Amiga!
